name: sectool
description: 安全从业者的交互式工具箱 - 面向红队/渗透测试/Bug Bounty 的多平台安全工具集
author: nidhogg1024

scripts.initialize: pnpm --filter sectool-config run build && pnpm --filter sectool-adapter-base run build && pnpm -r run adapter-build
scripts.check: pnpm run initialize && pnpm --filter sectool-core run check
scripts.dev: pnpm run initialize && pnpm --filter sectool-core run dev
scripts.build: pnpm run initialize && pnpm --filter sectool-core run build
scripts.release: node release.cjs && pnpm run build && pnpm -r run platform-release
scripts.vercel-build: pnpm run build && pnpm --filter sectool-site run build
